snippet: The luxury goods maker, whose profit warning in September sent shock waves through the industry, said other markets were strong.
abstract: British fashion house Burberry Group, seeking to reassure investors after a costly profit warning, issues interim report indicating slightly higher sales driven by overseas markets; report shows, however, that sales have continued to slow in China, a crucial market for luxury goods.
lead_paragraph: The luxury goods maker, whose profit warning in September sent shock waves through the industry, said other markets were strong.

headline.seo: Burberry Shares Rise on First-Half Sales Report
headline.main: Burberry Confirms Slowdown in Chinese Sales
headline.print_headline: Burberry Confirms Slowdown in Chinese Sales
